name: Halloween Night

name: Happy Unicorn
status: When target is killed, There is a chance to reduce all damage you suffer to 1 point; the effect lasts 3 seconds, Cooldown lasts 5 seconds (The less targets being killed in a unit time, the higher the trigger probability)
